<title level="1" right="Action">[Raconteur's Reload](/Actions.aspx?ID=910) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 109</row>

</column>

---

Your rapid or forceful words draw the enemy's attention away from your hands long enough to chamber another bullet. Interact to reload and then attempt a [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) check to [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45) or an [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check to [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53).
name: Raconteur's Reload
